Package index

All functions

batchCon_new()
Batch process, preliminary conservation assessments
check_tax_auth()
resolves taxonomicAuthor field when there are varying taxonimic fields returned from GBIF query
clean_occs()
Clean GBIF occurrences based on user-selected flags and/or specific gbifIDs
create_status_gauge()
Generate metrics from a clean point occurrence file
flag_occs()
Flags GBIF occurrence data based on common coordinate issues
get_gbif_occs()
Download georeferenced occurrence data using GBIF name identifier
get_name_keys()
Get accepted GBIF and POWO identifiers (keys) for taxon names to support data downloads
get_native_range()
Get native ranges for taxa
get_occs_range()
Get ISO two-digit code from occurrence lat longs
make_LC_points()
Combined function to get clean SIS points file using name identifiers
make_biorealms()
Generate a list of biorealms for a species
make_elevation()
Generate the elevation upper and lower bounds for the allfields.csv file
make_metrics()
Generate metrics from a clean point occurrence file
make_sis_csvs()
Generate all SIS connect csv files
make_sis_occs()
Convert cleaned gbif DWCA structure to IUCN SIS format
make_zip()
Generate the SIS connect zip file
name_search_gbif()
Query taxon name against GBIF backbone
name_search_powo()
Query taxon name against POWO (Plants of the World Online) backbone
occs_gbif_ref()
Generate GBIF download citation according to IUCN format
powo_lookup()
Lookup name in POWO (Plants of the World Online) using WCVP ID
powo_range()
Return native range of an accepted plant species from POWO (Plants of the World Online) using WCVP identifier
powo_ref()
Generate POWO download citation according to IUCN format
powo_text()
Lookup distribution, habit and climate text in POWO (Plants of the World Online) using WCVP ID
reorder_status()
Reorder taxonomic status to give priority to accepted name
replace_cardinal_directions()
Replace text from POWO so that it matches IUCN standards
sis_allfields()
Generate the allfields.csv file
sis_assessments()
Generate the assessments.csv file
sis_countries()
Generate the countries.csv file
sis_credits()
Generate the credits.csv file
sis_habitats()
Generate the habitats.csv file
sis_plantspecific()
Generate the plantspecific.csv file
sis_references()
Generate the references.csv file
sis_taxonomy()
Generate the taxonomy.csv file
species_map_batch()
Display a leaflet map to show the distribution of occurrence data for each species Batch version that iterates through species
species_map_single()
Display a leaflet map to show the distribution of occurrence data for each species
